ActNational Capital Act

SubjectNational Capital Commission ** Light Rail Transit Infrastructure **
PrecisOrder authorizing the NATIONAL CAPITAL COMMISSION to dispose to the City of Ottawa of real property and grant the City of Ottawa easements for a duration of 99 years each, as such disposals and easements may be required for the construction or operation of the Cityâ€™s light rail transit project.
